articles.description: The planned price increases for the ad-free options of two of Disney’s streaming services went into effect on Thursday, making Disney's ad-free plan $13.99 and Hulu's $17.99.
articles.content:
The planned price increases for the ad-free options of two of Disney’s streaming services officially took effect on Thursday. 
The California-based entertainment giant officially upped the per-month… [+2748 chars]

articles.description: All it took was Fielder snatching $100 from a little girl for his marriage to be cursed

articles.author: Chris Vognar
articles.title: He Tried to Convert a Remote Tribe to Christianity and Got Killed - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Documentary The Mission explores how John Chau, a young American evangelical, journeyed to North Sentinel Island and ended up shot full of arrows
articles.content: It’s not difficult to scorn John Chau. A 26-year-old evangelical Christian with a taste for outdoor adventure, he undertook a one-man mission in 2018 to North Sentinel Island, an extremely remote and… [+4241 chars]
